Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.context.ToolboxContext
          This class will be removed after VelocityTools 1.2. 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.AbstractSearchTool.getResults()
          Use AbstractPagerTool.getItems(). 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.XMLToolboxManager.getToolboxContext(Object)
          Use getToolbox(Object) instead. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.ToolboxManager.getToolboxContext(Object)
          Use getToolbox(Object initData) 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.AbstractSearchTool.hasResults()
          Use AbstractPagerTool.hasItems() 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.context.ChainedContext.setToolbox(ToolboxContext)
          Use setToolbox(Map) instead. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
